message: We just got our 500th like on Facebook!
Stream and download our brand new album 'Beware' here!
Check out this great review of our show with Bush!
Well we are ready to do this thing. We go on right at 8! Get there early!
TONIGHT! Hope to see some friendly faces rockin' out with us, this is sure to be a killer show!
Our guitar player and vocalist Jeff will be playing an acoustic set tomorrow night down at Work & Church Booze Parlor!

Last night's show at Hard Rock Hotel & Casino Sioux City was nothing short of an amazing experience for us. First off, we want to thank Calling Grace. We joked around on social media, but in reality those guys were a class act, super nice dudes. They really brought it last night, their performance was truly top notch. It was a pleasure sharing the stage with you gents
